Limited Time Dedicated Server Sale.

We are now offering dedicated servers in Kansas City, MO. 

These prices will be available thru 10-31-15

We ask for 24-48 hours for setup, but usually can be done in much less time.

If you need a custom configuration we are more than happy to provide you a quote.

Several Preconfigured servers to choose from.

For the first 25 orders over $25.00 we will do a credit matching bonus of 100% up to $75.00 - Your order is $30.00 we will credit your account $30.00 

Also available our standard credit matching on added funds. We match your added funds payment at 50% every time additional funds are added. Always available. 

The datacenter is based in the Bell Telephone Building in Kansas City, MO which is one of the key fiber transit Tier 2 Datacenter buildings in Kansas City. The facility is fed by redundant fiber lines from Hurricane Electric, Cogent Communications, and the Kansas City Internet Exchange.
